reviewText:
The pilots who flew the sorties tell their story in exclusive interviews as this VHS brings you footage of the aircraft and air crews of DESRET STORM.  Pilots in their own words describe the tension, the exhilaration..and the rigors of daily comabt.  This VHS brings you the story behind the story.  From Stealths to Warthogs.. carrier landings to Riyadh runways.  Watch the most stunning scenes of the worlds most powerful fighter aircraft..stories only the pilots could tell
WATCH THIS!
